name: King Milling Hard Wheat Flour
description: Hard red winter wheat, grown in the Central Plains states, is milled into flours. Ideally King Milling Hard Wheat Flour suited for making breads, buns, dinner rolls and other yeast-raised products. Hard red spring wheat is grown in the Northern Plains states and contains a stronger protein than hard red winter wheat. Hard red spring wheat is milled into flours for making bread, pizza dough, artisan breads, pita bread, flat bread and many other yeast-raised products.
